    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Awards</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20150217/546/awards" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky self-posted author- odd clearfix" id="node-article-546">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Awards" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 03-03-16</div>

  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p><img alt="" src="/sites/default/files/uploads/RiotAwardsHeader.jpg" style="width: 700px; height: 100px;" /></p>
<ul>
	<li>
		#51 Fortune&#39;s 100 Best Workplaces for Millenials - <a href="http://fortune.com/best-workplaces-millennials/">FORTUNE (2016)</a></li>
	<li>
		#14 Fortune&#39;s 50 Best Workplaces for Flexibility - <a href="http://fortune.com/best-workplaces-flexibility/" target="_blank">FORTUNE (2016)</a></li>
	<li>
		#39 Fortune&#39;s 100 Best Companies to Work For List -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20160302/2150/riot%E2%80%99s-great-place-work-second-year-row" target="_blank">FORTUNE (2016)</a></li>
	<li>
		#18 Glassdoor&#39;s Best Places to Work - <a href="https://www.glassdoor.com/Best-Places-to-Work-LST_KQ0,19.htm" target="_blank">Glassdoor (2016)</a></li>
	<li>
		#19 Fortune&#39;s 50 Best Workplaces for Camaraderie - <a href="http://fortune.com/best-workplaces-camaraderie/" target="_blank">FORTUNE (2015)</a></li>
	<li>
		#21 Fortune&#39;s 100 Best Workplaces for Millennials - <a href="http://fortune.com/best-workplaces-millennials/" target="_blank">FORTUNE (2015)</a></li>
	<li>
		#13 Fortune&#39;s 100 Best Companies to Work For List - <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150309/1656/riot-lands-13-fortune%E2%80%99s-100-best-companies-work-list" target="_blank">FORTUNE (2015)</a></li>
	<li>
		Pioneer Award (Co-founders Brandon Beck &amp; Marc Merrill) -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.gdconf.com/events/choiceawards.html" target="_blank">Game Developers Choice Awards (2014)</a></li>
	<li>
		#3 Best Medium-Sized Companies to Work For -&nbsp;<a href="http://money.cnn.com/gallery/news/companies/2013/09/19/best-small-medium-companies.fortune/29.html" target="_blank">FORTUNE (2013)</a></li>
	<li>
		#4 Top 25 Tech Companies to Work at in 2013, as Ranked by Their Own Staff --&nbsp;<a href="http://www.businessinsider.com/top-25-tech-companies-to-work-at-in-2013-2013-7#4-riot-games-is-the-place-to-be-if-you-want-to-work-in-the-gaming-industry-22" target="_blank">Business Insider (2013)</a></li>
	<li>
		Top 30 Developers of All Time -&nbsp;<a href="http://twvideo01.ubm-us.net/o1/gdmag/archives/GDM_JuneJuly_2013.pdf" target="_blank">Game Developer Magazine and Gamasutra (2013)</a></li>
	<li>
		Best Community Activation - Gaming Marketing Award (2013)</li>
	<li>
		Top 10 Developers -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.edge-online.com/features/edge-developer-awards-2013-the-top-50-studios-working-today/6/" target="_blank">Edge Developer Awards (2013)&nbsp;</a></li>
	<li>
		Top 10 Persons of the Year 2012 (Co-founders Brandon Beck &amp; Marc Merrill) -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/2012-12-17-persons-of-the-year-2012-part-one?utm_source=newsletter&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=european-daily" target="_blank">GamesIndustry International (2012)</a></li>
	<li>
		30 Under 30 (Co-founder Brandon Beck) -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.forbes.com/pictures/mfl45ielh/brandon-beck-ceo-and-founder-riot-games-29/" target="_blank"><em>Forbes&nbsp;</em>(2011)</a></li>
	<li>
		Entrepreneurs of the Year (Co-founders Brandon Beck and Marc Merrill) -&nbsp;Ernst &amp; Young (2011)</li>
	<li>
		Top 30 Developers -<em>&nbsp;</em><em>Game Developer Magazine&nbsp;</em>(2010)</li>
	<li>
		The Game Developer 50 (VP of Design Tom Cadwell) -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.gamasutra.com/view/feature/134577/the_game_developer_50.php?page=2" target="_blank">Gamasutra.com (2010)</a></li>
	<li>
		The Digital 100: The World&#39;s Most Valuable Startups -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.businessinsider.com/digital-100#51-riot-games-51" target="_blank"><em>Business Insider&nbsp;</em>(2010)</a></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img alt="" src="/sites/default/files/uploads/LoLAwardHeader.jpg" style="width: 700px; height: 100px; " /></p>
<ul>
	<li>
		Webby People&#39;s Voice Award, Events &amp; Live Webcasts - <a href="http://www.webbyawards.com/winners/2015/online-film-video/general-film-categories/events-live-webcasts/" target="_blank">Webby (2015)</a></li>
	<li>
		BAFTA Award, Persistent Game in 2015 - <a href="http://awards.bafta.org/award/2015/games" target="_blank">BAFTA (2015)</a></li>
	<li>
		Golden Reel Award, Game Cinematics (<em>A New Dawn</em>) - Motion Picture Sound Editors (2015)</li>
	<li>
		Audience Award, Best Community Relations &amp; Best Live Game -&nbsp;<a href="http://gdconlineawards.com/" target="_blank">GDC Online (2012)</a></li>
	<li>
		12 Best Free Entertainment Services and Apps of 2012 -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.pcworld.com/article/252607/the_12_best_free_entertainment_services_and_apps_of_2012.html" target="_blank"><em>PCWorld</em> (2012)</a></li>
	<li>
		100 Best PC Games of All Time -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.pcgamer.com/2011/02/16/the-100-best-pc-games-of-all-time/4/" target="_blank"><em>PC Gamer</em> (2012)</a></li>
	<li>
		Update of the Year -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.pcgamer.com/2012/02/08/pc-gamer-us-game-of-the-year-awards-2012/" target="_blank"><em>PC Gamer </em>(2012)</a></li>
	<li>
		Best Online Game - <em>Level Magazine</em> (2012)</li>
	<li>
		Game of the Year: MOBA -&nbsp;<em>GameSpy</em> (2011)</li>
	<li>
		Free Game of the Year -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.pcgamer.com/2011/12/29/league-of-legends-pc-gamer-uks-free-game-of-the-year/" target="_blank"><em>PC Gamer UK </em>(2011)</a></li>
	<li>
		15 Best PC Games - <em>GamePro</em> (2011)</li>
	<li>
		Free to Play Game of the Year -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.goldenjoystick.com/awards/about" target="_blank">Golden Joystick Awards (2011)</a></li>
	<li>
		Online Game of the Year -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.computerandvideogames.com/272489/gj10-online-game-of-the-year-is/" target="_blank">Golden Joystick Awards (2010)</a></li>
	<li>
		Audience Award, Best Online Technology, Best Online Visual Arts, Best Online Game Design &amp; Best New Online Game -&nbsp;<a href="http://www.gdconlineawards.com/archive/gdcoa_1st.html" target="_blank">GDC Online (2010)</a></li>
	<li>
		Readers&#39; Choice (Best Strategy Game) -&nbsp;<em>Best of IGN - PC</em> (2009)</li>
	<li>
		Readers&#39; Choice (Best Multiplayer Game) -&nbsp;<em>Best of IGN - PC</em> (2009)</li>
	<li>
		PC Gamer&#39;s Choice -&nbsp;<em>GameSpy </em>(2009)</li>
</ul>
 </div></div></div>

	<!-- BOX DE SERVIÇOS DO R7-->

	<div id="box-serv"></div>
	<!-- FUN BOX DE SERVIÇOS DO R7-->
					<div class="footer-social">
				
					<div id="r7-template-placer-widget-2" class="widget-container r7-template-placer-widget"><h3 class="widget-title twitter">Twitter</h3>					<div class="widget-container">
				<script type="text/javascript">
	var jsonurl = "http://social-api.r7.com/twitter/portalr7";
	
	function timeDifNow($created){
		    
		padrao = /-(\d)* /;
		var create = $created.replace(padrao, "");
		
		var d = new Date(create);
		var now = new Date();
		var dTime = d.getTime();
		var nTime = now.getTime();
		
		var dif = (nTime/1000) - (dTime/1000);
		
		var years = Math.floor(dif/(365*(24*3600)));
		var months = Math.floor(dif/(30*(24*3600)));
		var days = Math.floor(dif/(24*3600));
		var hours = Math.floor(dif/(3600));
		var minutes = Math.floor(dif/(60));
		var seconds = Math.floor(dif);
		
		//console.log(years+" "+months+" "+days+" "+hours+" "+minutes+" "+seconds )
		
		if(minutes < 1) {
			return (seconds+"s")
			return false;
		}
		if(hours < 1) {
			return (minutes+"m")
			return false;
		}
		if(days < 1) {
			return (hours+"m")
			return false;
		}
		
		return d.getDate()+"/"+d.getMonth()+"/"+d.getFullYear();
	}
	function twitter2($){
		$.ajax({
			url : jsonurl,
			dataType : "jsonp",
			success : function(data){
		
				var json = $.parseJSON(data);
				
				var 	html   = '<div class="footer-twitter">';									
							html += '<div class="footer-title-twitter">';
								html += '<a href="https://twitter.com/portalr7" target="_blank">@portalR7</a>';
								html += '<a id="footer-twitter" class="twitter-follow-button"  href="https://twitter.com/portalr7"  data-show-count="false" data-show-screen-name="false" data-lang="pt">Seguir</a>';
							html += '</div>';
							html += '<ul class="footer-twitter-list">';
			
								for (var i =0 ; i < json.length; i++) {
									//console.log(json[i].user.profile_image_url);
									html += '<li>';								
										html += '<div class="footer-twitter-tweet">';
										html += '<span class="footer-twitter-image" style="background: url('+json[i].user.profile_image_url+') center center no-repeat;"></span>';
										html += '<a href="https://twitter.com/portalr7" target="_blank" class="footer-twitter-link">Portal R7.com</a><span><a href="https://twitter.com/portalr7" target="_blank">@portalR7</a></span>';
										html += '<div class="footer-twitter-text"><a href="http://www.twitter.com/portalR7/status/'+json[i].id_str+'/" target="_blank">'+json[i].text+'</a></div>';
										html += '<div class="footer-twitter-hour">'+timeDifNow(json[i].created_at)+'</div>';
										html += '</div>';
									html += '</li>';							
								}		
							html += '</ul>';
						html += '</div>';
		 
				//coloco a variável html na tela
				$('#box-twitter').html(html);
			}
		});//termina o ajax
	}
	twitter2(jQuery);
</script>
<style>

      <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">
  <div id="zone-preface-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-preface-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-preface" class="zone zone-preface clearfix container-12">
    <div class="grid-4 region region-preface-first" id="region-preface-first">
  <div class="region-inner region-preface-first-inner">
    <div class="block block-panels-mini block-career-header block-panels-mini-career-header odd block-without-title" id="block-panels-mini-career-header">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="panel-display panel-1col clearfix" id="mini-panel-career_header">
  <div class="panel-panel panel-col">
    <div><div class="panel-pane pane-node careers-landing-header" >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="ds-1col exp-layout-text-related node node-explore-banner view-mode-full clearfix ">
    <div class="field-group-format group_scroll_group field-group-div group-scroll-group scroll-pane-explore speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field-group-format group_explore_meta field-group-div group-explore-meta  speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>Rioters Wanted</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>We&rsquo;re looking for humble but ambitious, razor-sharp professionals who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. These individuals will become part of entrepreneurial teams who prefer action (kicking ass) over process and bureaucracy (taking names). We embrace those who see things differently, who <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A43u58HQ-A8&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">aren&#39;t afraid to experiment</a>, and who have a healthy disregard for the rules.</p>
<p>Applicants should first learn about Riot and play <em>League of Legends </em>because we&#39;re looking for people who, like us, take play seriously and for whom it&#39;s never &quot;just a game.&quot; We play lots of games, especially our own, because hands-on gaming experience is our ultimate guiding compass.</p>
<p>We&#39;re hiring for multiple levels, from associate to lead, so don&#39;t get hung up on the title; it&#39;s all about the team. For the roles below that are listed by team name, we&#39;re hiring for varying levels of XP.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-explore-related-articles field-type-node-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">

<div class="box rw destaque_carousel_wide" id="box_56a17102a4fd5411be002a35">
<div class="destaque-carousel-wide schumi" id="destaque-carousel-wide-56a17102a4fd5411be002a35">
<div class="destaque-carousel-wide-container">

<a href="#" id="destaque-carousel-wide-next"><i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i></a>
<div class="cycle-slideshow" data-cycle-slides=".destaque-carousel-wide-item" data-cycle-fx=carousel data-cycle-timeout=0 data-cycle-carousel-visible=3 data-cycle-next="#destaque-carousel-wide-next" data-cycle-prev="#destaque-carousel-wide-prev" data-cycle-allow-wrap="false" data-cycle-carousel-hops=3 data-cycle-log="false">
<div class="destaque-carousel-wide-item">
<div class="destaque-carousel-wide-item-wrapper">
<a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/xuxa/mande-para-a-xuxa/inscreva-se-no-toc-toc-e-receba-xuxa-na-sua-casa-21012016" target="">
<figure class="main-image">
<img src="http://img.r7.com/images/2015/11/27/x95x9v48ghx_2z9qxermwe_file,qdimensions=180x123.pagespeed.ic.hIrPm62z7j.jpg" title="Reprodução/Rede Record">
</figure>
</a>
<div class="text">
<a class="title" href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/xuxa/mande-para-a-xuxa/inscreva-se-no-toc-toc-e-receba-xuxa-na-sua-casa-21012016" target="">

    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Tune in to the 24-hour Impact Challenge Livestream</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/ImpactChallengeLivestream" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-tsigmund odd clearfix" id="node-article-2347">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Tune in to the 24-hour Impact Challenge Livestream" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 11-08-16</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/ImpactChallengeLivestream">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/ImpactChallengeLivestream">PDF</a> -->

  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/RIC.LIVESTREAM.1920x1080-INTERNAL.jpg?itok=4LL6mipX" width="700" height="394" alt="" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>We&#39;re counting down the last day of the Impact Challenge during a livestream hosted at the main Riot campus in Los Angeles, California. Join a rotating cast of Rioters including Dash and Scarizard, along with Foxdrop, Jimmy Wong, Rocket Jump, and other special guests starting at 10:00 AM PST on Friday, November 11, as we game for 24 hours straight. We&rsquo;ll be playing <em>League</em>, <em>Mechs vs Minions</em>, and more of our favorite games on the official <a href="https://www.twitch.tv/leagueoflegends" target="_blank"><em>League of Legends</em> Twitch channel</a>.</p>
<p>We&rsquo;ve partnered with Omaze to put on the Impact Challenge in support of four non-profit orgs. You can unlock different rewards based on how much you give, and Omaze is sending five grand prize winners along with their guests to the All-Star Event in Barcelona! <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/RiotImpactChallenge">Learn more about the challenge and the charities over here</a>, and then <a href="https://www.omaze.com/previews/experiences/100184">visit the Omaze website to enter</a>!<br />
	<br />
	GLHF, and we&rsquo;ll see you during the livestream!&nbsp;</p>
<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="378" scrolling="no" src="https://player.twitch.tv/?channel=leagueoflegends" width="700"></iframe></p>

      <div class="view-content">

<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
if (typeof newsletter_check !== "function") {
	window.newsletter_check = function (f) {
		var re = /^([a-zA-Z0-9_\.\-\+])+\@(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]{1,})+\.)+([a-zA-Z0-9]{2,})+$/;
		if (!re.test(f.elements["ne"].value)) {
			alert("O e-mail está incorreto.");
			return false;
		}
		for (var i=1; i<20; i++) {
		if (f.elements["np" + i] && f.elements["np" + i].required && f.elements["np" + i].value == "") {
			alert("");
			return false;
		}
		}
		if (f.elements["ny"] && !f.elements["ny"].checked) {
			alert("You must accept the privacy statement");
			return false;
		}
		return true;
	}
}
//]]>

  <!-- Page -->
  
  <div class="page animsition">
    <div class="page-content padding-30-main container-fluid">
      

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-md-10 panel-content">
		<div class="span9">
        <h2>Getting Started</h2>

        <div style="height:15px;"></div>

        <p>Before proceeding with this introductory guide, we recommend becoming familiar with <a href="http://json.org" target="_blank">JavaScript Object Notation (JSON)</a> and
        <a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/concepts/" target="_blank">object-oriented programming concepts.</a></p>

        <p>This document will provide you with a basic understanding of the Riot Games API. It is designed to help you begin exploring and developing with the API as
        quickly as possible. We can't wait to see what you make!</p>

        <div style="height:15px;"></div>
        <h4>Registering for the Riot Games API</h4>

        <p>Before you can begin developing with the Riot Games API, you must <a href="/signin" target="_blank">sign in</a> with your <em>League of Legends</em> account.
        When you sign in, a developer portal account is created for you, which generates a development API key associated with your account. Your account will also allow you to communicate with our
        team regarding your application and usage, and vice versa. For more information on API keys, see the API Keys documentation. Note that
        every Riot Games API request requires an API key, so you will need to include your API key using the api_key parameter on each request.</p>

        <p>
        </p><pre>https://na.api.pvp.net/api/lol/na/v1.4/summoner/by-name/RiotSchmick<span style="color:#008">?api_key=</span><span style="color:#080">&lt;key&gt;</span></pre>

        <p><em>Remember to replace <span style="color:#080">&lt;key&gt;</span> with your API key.</em>
        </p>

        <p>For more information and examples, try executing APIs on the <a href="/api-methods/">API Reference</a> page.</p>

        <div style="height:15px;"></div>

        <h4>Hello, World!</h4>

        <p>The quickest route to making awesome is to see the simplest example possible. The following cURL request loads RiotSchmick's basic summoner object in JSON.</p>

        <br>

        <pre class="prettyprint" style="margin-bottom: 10px;">curl --request GET 'https://na.api.pvp.net/api/lol/na/v1.4/summoner/by-name/RiotSchmick?api_key=&lt;key&gt;' --include</pre>

        <p><em>Remember to replace <span style="color:#080">&lt;key&gt;</span> with your API key.</em></p>

        <p>If you don't have cURL, but still want to try this out, you can copy and paste the URL into your browser.</p>

        <div style="height:15px;"></div>

        <h4>Validating Calls</h4>

        <p>Keep in mind the following guidelines as you build and maintain your project. We ask that you do certain validations before making calls to the API.</p>

        <ul>
            <li> Make sure that you are using the proper value of either region or platform for the given endpoint. Some endpoints take a region parameter and some take a platform ID. Use the values that each specific endpoints
            expects. If you specify the wrong type of value, the call will return a 403.</li>
            <li> Don't make assumptions about what the value region and platform ID values are. Check the <a href="/regional-endpoints.html">Regional Endpoints documentation</a> and ensure you are
            using the right values. For example, we get a lot of calls using OCE1 as a platform ID, but the correct value is OC1. If you specify an incorrect region or platform value, the call will return a 403.</li>
            <li>Make sure that you are using the proper DNS for the region you are trying to hit. We see a lot of people making calls with the wrong DNS for the region they are specifying in the path. For example:
            https://eune.api.pvp.net/api/lol/na/v1.4/summoner/585897 - the EUNE proxy doesn't know anything about the NA region, so this call will return a 403. If you aren't sure which DNS to use for which endpoint and
            region combination, then use the API reference page to test it. The reference page will display the proper DNS and path parameters to use for each endpoint and region.</li>
            <li>If you have a input field on your site or in your app that lets a user enter a summoner name to lookup, do not blindly pass that value along to the API without first doing some validation. Any request with
            a name parameter that contains any characters that are not valid for a summoner name, even if they are URL encoded, will return a 403. The full set of allowed characters across Riot, Tencent, and Garena regions
            includes any visible Unicode letter characters, digits (0-9), spaces, underscores, and periods. Other than that, no punctuation characters are allowed. Thus, the regular expression to use for validating summoner
            names would be as follows.<br>

            <pre>^[0-9\\p{L} _\\.]+$</pre>

            You should be rejecting inputs that don't match this regular expression (i.e., that contain any punctuation characters other than periods, underscores, and spaces), rather than sending them to the API.</li>

            <li>Keep your project current. Sometimes endpoints are deprecated and removed. If your key continues calling the old endpoints after they go away, the requests will return a 403.</li>
            <li>Keep track of the errors you are receiving and audit them over time. Just because you weren't getting 4xx errors before doesn't mean you never will. As mentioned in the previous point, the endpoints can change
            over time, and you need to keep your project in working order if you want to keep your API access.</li>
            <li>In general, any 4xx errors returned from our API are client side errors, which means that there is something wrong with your request. If you see any 4xx errors coming back from the API, then you need to change
            something on your end to fix the issue. For more information about any 4xx errors you may be receiving, refer to our <a href="/response-code.html">Response Codes documentation</a>.</li>
        </ul>

        <b>Note that keys can be revoked or disabled, or your API rate limit lowered, if your key is making consistent invalid calls along these lines.</b>

        <div style="height:15px;"></div>

        <h4>Rate Limits</h4>

        <p>For more information on what rate limits are, why we use them, and how they affect your usage of the API, please see the <a href="/rate-limiting.html">Rate Limiting</a>
        documentation.</p>

        <div style="height:15px;"></div>

        <h4>Response Formats</h4>

        <p>The Riot Games API returns all data in valid JSON. A few programming languages include native support for JSON. For those that dont, you can find a suitable library at
            <a href="http://www.json.org" target="_blank">http://www.json.org</a>.</p>

        <p>Note that our APIs return only non-empty values to save on bandwidth. Zero is considered an empty value, as well as empty strings, empty lists, and nulls. Any numeric field
        that isn't returned can be assumed to be 0 (or null as you prefer). Any list field that isn't returned can be assumed to be an empty list or null. Any String field that isn't
        returned can be assumed to be empty string or null.</p>

        <div style="height:15px;"></div>

        <h4>Seed Data</h4>

        <p>We offer static seed data to help get you started.</p>

        <ul>
            <li>The seed data contains 1,000 <b>ranked solo queue games</b>, but no games from any other queue type.</li>
            <li>The seed data is split into 10 files named <b>matches1.json</b> through <b>matches10.json</b>.</li>
            <li>The seed data will be updated whenever changes are made to the match API.</li>
        </ul>

        <p>You can find the seed data in the following directory:<br>
            https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/riot-developer-portal/seed-data/<br>
            <br>
            For example:<br>
            <a href="https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/riot-developer-portal/seed-data/matches1.json" target="_blank">https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/riot-developer-portal/seed-data/matches1.json</a></p>

        <div style="height:15px;"></div>

        <h4>Great! Now What?</h4>
        
            <p>Signing in with your <em>League of Legends</em> account is the quickest way to begin making API requests. Otherwise, if you're curious about the APIs themselves, consider viewing the full API reference.</p>

            <div style="height:25px;"></div>
            <a href="/signin" class="btn btn-riotred btn-large">Sign In</a>
            <a href="/api-methods" class="btn btn-riotred btn-large" style="margin-left: 20px">View Full API Reference</a>
            </div>
	</div>
</div>


    </div>
  </div>

  <script src="/static/js/remark/vendor/asscrollable/jquery.asScrollable.all.min.1e23c8f199b7.js"></script>
  <script src="/static/js/remark/vendor/ashoverscroll/jquery-asHoverScroll.min.a190cd6a5
